sentences.sentence: Model suggests how protoplanets kept a safe distance from the sun
sentences.translation: 动态模拟证明原行星是怎样保持与太阳之间有一个安全的距离。

sentences.sentence: Studying Vesta may give clues to the formative years of our early Solar System, as the unusual world may be one of the largest remaining protoplanets.
sentences.translation: 研究灶神星或许有助于得到早期太阳系形成的线索，因为灶神星这个不同寻常的世界也许是残留的最大原行星之一。

sentences.sentence: When the disk begins to coalesce into protoplanets, the gravity of those protoplanets pulls clumps of gas around the disk with them as they orbit the star.
sentences.translation: 当这个盘状物开始合并成为一组原行星时，它们的引力拉动着盘状物周围气体所凝聚的硬块，一起环绕着恒星作轨道运行。
